message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $9500. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand that you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $8500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand that you need to make a profit, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I can offer $7500. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $8200 for the product. Can you meet me at $8200?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I can offer $8100. Can you consider that?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $8250 for the product. Can you meet me at $8250?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I can offer $8150. Can you consider that?
